name: Way of the Ascendant Dragon
description: These monks channel draconic power to bolster allies and unleash elemental fury.

3.name: Draconic Disciple
3.description: Tap into draconic presence, change unarmed strike damage to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison, and learn Draconic or another language.

3.name: Breath of the Dragon
3.description: Replace one attack with a 20-foot cone or 30-foot line of elemental energy, dealing damage equal to two Martial Arts dice to each creature failing a Dexterity save. Uses equal to proficiency bonus or 2 ki per use when expended.

6.name: Wings Unfurled
6.description: When you use Step of the Wind, sprout spectral wings to gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed until the end of the turn, a number of times per long rest equal to your proficiency bonus.

11.name: Aspect of the Wyrm
11.description: As a bonus action, create a 10-foot aura for 1 minute granting either a frightful presence or damage resistance to you and allies.

17.name: Ascendant Aspect
17.description: Augment your breath to larger shapes and higher damage, gain 10-foot blindsight, and unleash explosive fury when you activate Aspect of the Wyrm.
